name: 5 Seconds Game
description:
You must win the game in 5 seconds.

Drag Rocks, Drink Strange Potions, Go in doors

A Game made for the Idle Thumbs Winter Wizard Jam and also Just For Fun

It will receive sporadic updates until suitably finished

Also --

Mac Only!!! Sorry!!!

Windows version will depend on how easy Game Maker makes it but expect it on a sometime
